name: nyt-react
description: New Yorks Times scraper. MERN STACK

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.dev: echo "This command has been deprecated. Use 'npm start'" && exit 1

author: leelandmiller
